# todo_todo (Data Source)

Fetch a todo.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (Number) The unique identifier for the todo.

### Read-Only

- `completed` (Boolean) The completed status for the todo.
- `description` (String) The description for the todo.
